channel.title: 2 questions about my server
channel.description:
Hey guys, I need 2 things added to my server.. 1 seems simple the other doesn't but I'm up for it :]
1) REAL Rs Skillcape emotes (I have fake ones but I really want real ones anyone know a tutorial? 2) How can I add announcements on a timer to my server like make it say "[SERVER] Please vote for this server daily" Like every 2 minutes?
Please give me a guide or tell me how to add these things.. thanks :)
